name: Tokyo Remit (latest version)
description:
Amidst a civilization in uprising, you, the player must pilot a drone, the protagonist, through an urban cityscape, inspired by the likes of Cyberpunk and Ghost in the Shell.

WASD = Move 

Space & Left Shift = Up & Down

Aware of all the puzzle issues and the player going out of control when slamming into objects and the ground

Also experimenting with lighting  on buildings at the start of the level so would appreciate feedback to see if it works or not
